overview: A routine account of the 1913 Epsom Derby, one of many horse races that the Topical Budget newsreel covered that year, this film inadvertently made a contribution to the history of the suffragette movement by capturing the moment when activist Emily Davison was trampled by Anmer, King George V's horse, after she invaded the track.
tagline: THE RACE FROM START TO FINISH AND INCIDENTS OF THE DAY
title: The Derby
